org.sakaiproject.content.providers

Class BaseEventDelayHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sakaiproject.content.providers.BaseEventDelayHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ScheduledInvocationCommand, EventDelayHandler

    public class BaseEventDelayHandler
extends Object
implements EventDelayHandler, ScheduledInvocationCommand

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected static class  BaseEventDelayHandler.ReEvent
      Local implementation of Event to allow the setting of all fields when refiring an event after it has been scheduled to run later than it was originally fired.

    • Field Summary

      contains a map of the database dependent handler.
